mapper.select: select show_image_url imagePath, goods_code goodsCode, sort_no sortNo, begin_time beginTime, end_time endTime, version version from t_picture_show where is_deleted = 0 and (now() between begin_time and end_time) and show_state = 1 order by sort_no Asc

select b.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, b.sale_price salePrice, b.image_url imagePath, a.hot_sort hotSort, a.create_time createTime, a.create_name createName, a.update_time updateTime, a.update_name updateName, a.version version from t_hot_goods a RIGHT JOIN t_goods b on a.goods_code = b.goods_code where a.is_deleted = 0 order by a.hot_sort Asc LIMIT 0,#{showNo}
select a.show_no showNo from t_dictionary a where a.type = 4 and a.is_deleted = 0
